ðŸ“– Summary: microsandbox is a self-hosted platform for securely executing untrusted code, such as AI-generated code or user submissions. It combines the security of traditional VMs with the speed of containers, offering bulletproof security, instant startup times, and complete control over your infrastructure. It is OCI compatible and includes a built-in MCP server for seamless AI integration.
